trans-unit.source: Holds the list of items that constitute the content of an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 保留構成的內容項目清單<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ItemCollection maintains a collection of items such as strings, objects, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes, elements, and other collections.
trans-unit.target: ItemCollection 會維護集合的項目，例如字串、 物件、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]節點、 元素和其他集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> uses the data in the ItemCollection to generate its content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>的 ItemCollection 中使用的資料來產生其內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: If you want to aggregate more than one collection, assign a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要彙總多個集合，將指派<xref:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection>給<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>您<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A></xref:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection>

trans-unit.source: Use either the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property to specify the collection that should be used to generate the content of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 使用其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性，以指定應該用來產生您<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>內容的集合</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection will be made read-only and fixed-size.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>集合將會進行唯讀固定大小。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that if you are using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property, you cannot add, delete, or change items in the ItemCollection directly.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，如果您使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性，您無法加入、 刪除或變更項目的 ItemCollection 中直接。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: ItemCollection is a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> and therefore provides collection view functionalities, such as sorting, grouping, and filtering.
trans-unit.target: ItemCollection 會<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>，因此提供的集合檢視的功能，例如排序、 分組和篩選。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.SortDescriptions%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.Filter%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.GroupDescriptions%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.SortDescriptions%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.Filter%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.GroupDescriptions%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.GroupDescriptions%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.Filter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.SortDescriptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about collection views, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需集合檢視的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將項目至<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The item to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至集合的項目。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the object is added or -1 if the item cannot be added.
trans-unit.target: 在以零為起始的索引則會新增物件則為-1 如果無法加入項目。

trans-unit.source: The collection is in ItemsSource mode.
trans-unit.target: 集合是 ItemsSource 模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view supports turning filtering data in real time on or off.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示集合檢視是否支援開啟或關閉即時篩選資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection view supports turning live filtering on or off; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合檢視支援開啟或關閉; 關閉即時篩選否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view supports turning grouping data in real time on or off.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示集合檢視是否支援即時開啟群組資料，開啟或關閉。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection view supports turning live grouping on or off; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合檢視支援開啟即時群組開啟或關閉。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view supports turning sorting data in real time on or off.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示集合檢視是否支援開啟或關閉即時排序資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection view supports turning live sorting on or off; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合檢視支援開啟或關閉; 開啟即時排序否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this collection view supports filtering.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出此集合檢視是否支援篩選。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether this collection supports filtering before assigning a filter callback to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.Filter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來檢查這個集合是否支援篩選指派來篩選條件回呼之前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.Filter%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.Filter%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this view supports filtering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此檢視支援篩選。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this collection view supports grouping.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出此集合檢視是否支援群組。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to test whether the current implementation supports grouping before using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.GroupDescriptions%2A> property to add <xref:System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來測試目前的實作會支援使用之前的群組是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.GroupDescriptions%2A>屬性將<xref:System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription>物件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.GroupDescriptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection supports grouping; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合支援的群組。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this collection view supports sorting.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出此集合檢視是否支援排序。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether this collection supports sorting before using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.SortDescriptions%2A> property to add <xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來檢查這個集合是否支援排序之前使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.SortDescriptions%2A>屬性將<xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription>物件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.SortDescriptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this view support sorting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此檢視支援排序。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection and releases the references on all items currently in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合，並釋放目前位於集合中的所有項目上的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection"></xref> is in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> mode. (When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection will be made read-only and fixed-size.)
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection"></xref> is in <>*> mode.(當<> *> 設定屬性，則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合將會進行唯讀固定大小。)</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is in this view.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的項目是否在這個檢視中。

trans-unit.source: The object to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the item belongs to this collection and passes the active filter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示項目屬於此集合，並傳遞作用中的篩選器。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection to an array, starting at a particular array index.
trans-unit.target: 將集合的元素複製到陣列，從特定的陣列索引開始。

trans-unit.source: The destination array to copy to.
trans-unit.target: 要複製到目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the destination array.
trans-unit.target: 目的地陣列中以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The array parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The array parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The destination array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: 目的地 array 是多維的。

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: index 參數小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of records in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合中的記錄數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the collection or 0 if the collection is uninitialized or if there is no collection in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> mode.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的項目數或 0 未初始化的集合，或如果沒有在集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current item in the view.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的項目檢視中。

trans-unit.source: The current object in the view or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the collection is uninitialized or if there is no collection in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> mode.
trans-unit.target: 在檢視中目前的物件或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果集合是未初始化，或在沒有集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>

trans-unit.source: By default, the first item of the collection starts as the current item.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，集合的第一個項目會啟動目前的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ordinal position of the current item within the view.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的項目，在檢視中的序數位置。

trans-unit.source: The ordinal position of the current item within the view or -1 if the collection is uninitialized or if there is no collection in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> mode.
trans-unit.target: 集合未初始化目前的項目中檢視或-1 的序數位置，或如果沒有在集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>

trans-unit.source: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to merge changes to the view and delay automatic refresh.
trans-unit.target: 進入延後循環，您可以用來合併變更到檢視，並且延遲自動重新整理。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used to create a `using` scope and then place multiple view-changing calls within the scope.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常用來建立`using`範圍，然後將多個檢視變更呼叫放在範圍內。

trans-unit.source: This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.
trans-unit.target: 延後循環結束之前，這會延遲自動重新整理。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IDisposable> object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IDisposable>可用來處置呼叫物件的物件。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a callback used to determine if an item is suitable for inclusion in the view.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定回呼，用來判斷項目是否適合包含在檢視中。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.CanFilter%2A> property to test whether the current implementation supports filtering before assigning this property with a non-null value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.CanFilter%2A>來測試是否目前的實作中支援篩選之前指派非 null 值與這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.CanFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: A method used to determine if an item is suitable for inclusion in the view.
trans-unit.target: 用來判斷項目是否適合包含在檢視中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Filtering is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援篩選。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item at the specified zero-based index in this view.
trans-unit.target: 在此檢視會傳回指定之以零為起始索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: This method evaluates the index with any sorting, filtering, or grouping criteria that are set on the view using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會評估任何排序、 篩選或群組檢視上所設定準則的索引<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the item is located.
trans-unit.target: 項目所在的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The item at the specified zero-based index in this view.
trans-unit.target: 此檢視中指定的以零為起始索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: index is out of range.
trans-unit.target: index已超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: The collection is uninitialized or the binding on <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> supplied a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 集合未初始化或上的繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>提供<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref> objects that defines how to group the items.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref>物件定義的項目分組方式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.CanGroup%2A> property to test whether the current implementation supports grouping before adding <xref:System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.CanGroup%2A>屬性來測試是否目前的實作支援群組，然後再加入<xref:System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription>物件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.CanGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property can be set only by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as `Add`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 可以設定這個屬性，只能由存取的集合物件與使用的各種方法，例如`Add`。

trans-unit.source: The property to access the collection object is read-only, while the collection itself is read-write.
trans-unit.target: 要存取的集合物件的屬性是唯讀的集合本身時為讀寫。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The collection is indexed by the group levels.
trans-unit.target: 集合具有索引的群組層級。

trans-unit.source: Gets the top-level groups that are constructed according to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.GroupDescriptions*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得建構<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.GroupDescriptions*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.GroupDescriptions*>根據最上層群組

trans-unit.source: The top-level groups that are constructed according to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.GroupDescriptions*>.
trans-unit.target: 建構<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.GroupDescriptions*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.GroupDescriptions*>根據最上層群組

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index in this collection where the specified item is located.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個集合中的索引，指定的項目所在的位置。

trans-unit.source: The object to look for in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中尋找的物件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item in the collection, or -1 if the item does not exist in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中，則為-1 的項目不存在於集合中項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an element into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將元素插入集合中指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: All items after the specified position are moved down by one.
trans-unit.target: 指定位置之後的所有項目是由其中一個往下移。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert the item.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引處插入項目。

trans-unit.source: The item to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的項目。

trans-unit.source: The collection is in ItemsSource mode.
trans-unit.target: 集合是 ItemsSource 模式。

trans-unit.source: The index is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 索引超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current item of the view is beyond the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出檢視的目前項目是否超過集合的結尾。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current item of the view is beyond the end of the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果檢視的目前項目集合結尾之外否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current item of the view is beyond the beginning of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出檢視的目前項目是否超過集合的開頭。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current item of the view is beyond the beginning of the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果檢視的目前項目超過集合的開頭否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the resulting (filtered) view is empty.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否產生 （已篩選） 的檢視為空白。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting view is empty; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果產生的檢視是空的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether filtering data in real time is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用篩選即時資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if filtering data in real time is enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if live filtering is not enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if it cannot be determined whether the collection view implements live filtering.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果啟用篩選即時資料。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果未啟用即時篩選;<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>如果無法判別集合檢視是否實作即時篩選。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether grouping data in real time is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用群組中即時的資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if grouping data in real time is enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if live grouping is not enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if it cannot be determined whether the collection view implements live grouping.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用群組中即時的資料;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果未啟用即時的群組。<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>如果無法判別集合檢視是否實作即時的群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether sorting in real time is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用即時排序。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if sorting data in real time is enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if live sorting is not enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if it cannot be determined whether the collection view implements live sorting.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用排序即時資料。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果未啟用即時排序;<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>如果無法判別集合檢視是否實作即時排序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the item at the given zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定的以零為起始索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The object retrieved or the object that is being set to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的物件或設定與指定索引的物件。

trans-unit.source: The collection is uninitialized, or the item to set already has a different logical parent, or the collection is in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> mode.
trans-unit.target: 集合未初始化，或已設定的項目有不同的邏輯父代，或集合中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>模式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>

trans-unit.source: The index is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 索引超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in filtering data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，其中指定篩選即時資料中加入的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in filtering data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性參與在篩選中即時資料的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in grouping data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定屬性參與群組即時資料中的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in grouping data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性參與群組即時資料中的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in sorting data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定屬性參與排序即時資料的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that specify the properties that participate in sorting data in real time.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬性參與排序即時資料的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection needs to be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出集合是否需要重新整理。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection needs to be refreshed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合需要重新整理。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item belongs to this view.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的項目是否屬於此檢視。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used during collection-changed notifications to determine if the specified item belongs to this view.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常是在集合變更通知期間判斷指定的項目是否屬於此檢視。

trans-unit.source: The object to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the specified item belongs to this view or there is no filter set on this collection view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示指定的項目屬於此檢視，或沒有任何篩選條件設定此集合檢視。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified item reference from the collection or view.
trans-unit.target: 從集合或檢視中移除指定的項目參考。

trans-unit.source: When an item is removed from the collection, any remaining items with higher index values decrement their index by one as the size of the collection collapses.
trans-unit.target: 當從集合移除項目時，較高的索引值與其餘所有項目會遞減其索引以一為集合的大小會摺疊。

trans-unit.source: The object to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection"></xref> is read-only because it is in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> mode or if DeferRefresh is in effect.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection"> </xref>是唯讀的因為它處於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>模式，或如果 DeferRefresh 會生效。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index of the collection or view.
trans-unit.target: 移除集合或檢視表的指定索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: When an item is removed from the collection, any remaining items with higher index values decrement their index by one as the size of the collection collapses.
trans-unit.target: 當從集合移除項目時，較高的索引值與其餘所有項目會遞減其索引以一為集合的大小會摺疊。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection"></xref> is read-only because it is in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> mode or if DeferRefresh is in effect.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection"> </xref>是唯讀的因為它處於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>模式，或如果 DeferRefresh 會生效。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>

trans-unit.source: The index is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 索引超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects that describe how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref>說明如何在檢視中分組的項目集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.CanSort%2A> property to test whether the current implementation supports sorting before adding <xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription> objects to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.CanSort%2A>屬性來測試是否目前的實作會支援排序之前將<xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription>物件</xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription>新增至<xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection.CanSort%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property can be set only by accessing the collection object and using its various methods, such as `Add`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 可以設定這個屬性，只能由存取的集合物件與使用的各種方法，例如`Add`。

trans-unit.source: The property to access the collection object is read-only, while the collection itself is read-write.
trans-unit.target: 要存取的集合物件的屬性是唯讀的集合本身時為讀寫。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref> objects that describe how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.ComponentModel.SortDescription"></xref>說明如何在檢視中分組的項目集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unsorted and unfiltered collection that underlies this collection view.
trans-unit.target: 取得做為此集合檢視的未排序和已篩選集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object that is the underlying collection or the user-provided <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>物件基礎的集合或使用者提供<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Collections.IList>有固定大小，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Collections.IList>否則讀取<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Adds a new item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將新的項目加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: The new item that is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 新項目加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a new item can be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以加入新項目至集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在集合中，可以加入新的項目否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示集合檢視是否可以捨棄暫止的變更，並還原已編輯物件的原始值。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView> interface.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合檢視可以捨棄暫止的變更並還原已編輯物件; 的原始值否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Ends the edit transaction and, if possible, restores the original value to the item.
trans-unit.target: 結束編輯異動，並可能的話，請還原項目的原始值。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: Ends the add transaction and discards the pending new item.
trans-unit.target: 結束加入異動並捨棄暫止的新項目。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。
